English: up here, down there (idiom); to rise and fall in succession
francais: se lever et se baisser alternativement

d.f: `這裡~`興起~，`那裡~`倒下~。`形容~`連續不斷~。`如~：「`八二三炮戰~`時~，`炸彈~`此起彼伏~，`所有~`屋~`舍~`都~`毀於一旦~。」`也~`作~「`此起彼落~」。

English: up here, down there (idiom); to rise and fall in succession
no sooner one subsides, the next arises
occurring again and again (of applause, fires, waves, protests, conflicts, uprisings etc)
francais: se lever et se baisser alternativement
